content: inspired by chloe kim s gold medal win in the women s snowboard halfpipe at the olympics here is mock up of the darling hat that she wore showing off the american flag wear it brimless for a slouchy look or brimmed to look like kim it can be made in about two hours make one while you watch the olympics **notes -** hat is worked in one piece in the round your preferred method finished circumference about 18 inches will stretch to fit a range of sizes finished length - about 10 inches **update ** original pattern held yarn double to create that super bulky look added rasta and crazy sexy wool as options for using just one super bulky yarn also added the required needle size to the printed pattern
